did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Susan Speigel Postcards must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Susan Speigel Postcards, Ms2000-099, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Susan Speigel postcards were added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Susan Speigel collection consists of a bound limited edition compilation of postcards depicting architectural sketches by Speigel entitled Composition as Explanation: The Plan.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the IAWA Small Collections. Finding aid available on the Virginia Heritage database.
